short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a date to greenhouse.io, lever.co, and ashbyhq.com job postings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a very simple extension that adds a "Posted on:" field to greenhouse.io, lever.co, and ashbyhq.com job posting webpages. 

In some cases a job may have been posted weeks, months, or even years ago. This extension aims to give job seekers an additional data point to help them in their journey. 

If you get any value out of this extension and want to pay it forward, please make a donation to the DC Public Education fund: https://dcedfund.org/invest/
